original_text:
“Come down from your glory,
    and sit on the parched ground,
    O inhabitant of Dibon!
For the destroyer of Moab has come up against you;
    he has destroyed your strongholds.
korean_text: 디본에 사는 딸아 네 영화에서 내려와 메마른 데 앉으라 모압을 파멸하는 자가 올라와서 너를 쳐서 네 요새를 깨뜨렸음이로다

sentences.original_text: and sit on the parched ground
For the destroyer of Moab has come up against you
sentences.korean_translation: 모압을 파멸하는 자가 너를 치러 올라왔느니라
